Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people communicating from a distance using a string telephone.
The student can illustrate that the device uses sound to send messages between the two people.
The student can show the length of the string as a key feature of the device for effective communication.
The student can draw only the materials necessary for building the string telephone, such as two cups and a string.
The student can depict how sound travels along the string from one cup to the other.
The student can include a description or label in the drawing to explain how the string telephone works.
